page.title: 10Recreation, Eaton B & Edlesb
page.content: There is a wide variety of clubs to interest all ages. For youngsters there are Mothers-and-Toddlers and playgroups in both villages. Brownies, Guides, Cubs and Scouts all meet at Edlesborough. The only Youth Club is attached to the parish church in Eaton Bray. There are children's playgrounds in both villages and a BMX cycle track in Edlesborough. A new recreation ground is planned for E/B. For ladies, there are the Women's Institute, Young Wives and Keep Fit, with separate groups in each village. Other clubs include the Village Produce Assoc, Chiltern Computer Club, a Choral Society and the Over 60s' Club. Sports enthusiasts can play badmington, football, cricket and tennis. Dominoes and Darts leagues are based in the local pubs and coarse fishing is available at Park Farm.
